<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 427, 236, 442]]<|/det|>
INSTRUCTIONS

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 443, 292, 458]]<|/det|>
- Answer all questions.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 459, 761, 475]]<|/det|>
- Use a black or dark blue pen. You may use an HB pencil for any diagrams or graphs.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 476, 808, 492]]<|/det|>
- Write your name, centre number and candidate number in the boxes at the top of the page.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 493, 565, 508]]<|/det|>
- Write your answer to each question in the space provided.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 509, 482, 523]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 526, 361, 540]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 541, 482, 555]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 558, 335, 572]]<|/det|>
- You may use tracing paper.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 574, 466, 587]]<|/det|>
- You must show all necessary working clearly.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 589, 664, 620]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 622, 489, 636]]<|/det|>
